mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure the navigation menu is easily accessible with fewer clicks on mobile for better usability.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and consider lazy loading for faster page rendering.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more detailed and localized keywords to the meta descriptions and headings for better search visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve readability by enhancing font contrast and simplifying the booking process flow.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking steps and offer a clear progress indicator to reduce user confusion.
tips: Optimize image loading for mobile devices
Add alt text to all images for accessibility
Consider adding a live chat feature to improve customer engagement
